title: What's News: Business & Finance
text:
Florida's stripping Disney of its special taxing privileges leaves investors wondering who pays back almost $1 billion of municipal bonds.

The fallout from the spat between Disney and DeSantis alarmed corporate leaders, according to executives and their advisers.

Buffett called markets over the past few years "a gambling parlor," as Berkshire Hathaway makes new investments after a period of relative quiet.

Berkshire's quarterly earnings fell as market turbulence weighed on its stock portfolio and rising claims costs hurt its insurance-underwriting business.

What's News: Business & Finance
